"The kindest and best of men", an amazing actor and The Voice - he will be remembered always! 
My other blogs are @covergirlsanddancingcavaliers for everything related to Old Hollywood, @petalpinkpeonies for pretty nature- and cottagecore aesthetics and finally @rememberedkisses, my general blog. Hope to see you there as well!

summary: All the Young Dudes: Bootleg Tapes
title: All the Young Dudes: Bootleg Tapes
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ks8rok

by MsKingBean89

A selection of short stories from various points in the ‘All the Young Dudes’ timeline. From different character POVs.

Basically I sometimes write little character studies that turn into longer pieces to help me get into other characters heads (besides Remus). That’s what these are. Some of them provide background info for the goings on in All the Young Dudes.

Words: 3079, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of All the Young Dudes

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, Hope Lupin, Sirius Black, James Potter
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin
  • Additional Tags: wolfstar


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ks8rok

summary: I made a song. It goes like :
body:
I made a song. It goes like :

HOW CAN I LIVE🎶

KNOWING MY OTP WILL NEVER BE CANON🎶

HOW CAN I LIVE🎶

KNOWING MY FAV CHARACTER IS DEAD🎶

HOW CAN I LIVE🎶

KNOWING I HAVE TO WAIT SO LONG TILL THE NEXT BOOK/MOVIE🎶

HOW CAN I LIVE🎶

KNOWING ALL THOSE CHARACTERS WILL NEVER EXIST IN MY WORLD🎶

blog.name: sansael
blog.title: Richard Armitage is a Slytherin.
blog.description:
I Am Ukrainian Wonder Woman.
Anti-communism and anti-nazim blog. 
If anyone has a HP book they don't want anymore, I will gladly give it a new home.

title: Harry Potter Vocabulary in Ukrainian
body:
Inspired by @ mylittlelanguagelab and their Polish list!

The ‘ before vowels stands for accent. 

Nouns

  • магія /m’agia/ - magic
  • чарівник /charivn’yk/ - wizard
  • чарівниця /charivn’ytsia/, відьма /v’idma/ - witch
  • чарівна паличка /char’ivna p’alychka/ - wand
  • закляття /zakli’attia/ - spell
  • казан /kaz’an/ - cauldron
  • настійка /nast’iyka/ - potion
  • замок /zamok/ - castle
  • підземелля /pidzem’ellia/ - dungeon
  • таємний прохід /tai’emnyi prokh’id/ - secret passageway
  • вежа /v’ezha/ - tower
  • коридор /koryd’or/ - hallway
  • класна кімната /kl’asna kimn’ata/, клас /klas/ - classroom
  • урок /oor’ok/ - lesson
  • підручник /pdir’oochnyk/ - textbook
  • пергамент /perh’ament/ - parchment
  • бібліотека /bibliokt’eka/ - library
  • перо /per’o/ - quill
  • маґл (m), маґелка (f) /mugelka/ - muggle 


Предмети /Predm’ety/ - Subjects

  • Замовляння /zamovli’annia/ - Charms
  • Настійки /nast’iyky/ - Potions
  • Трансфігурація /transfigur’atsia/-  Transfiguration
  • Гербалогія /herbal’ogia/ - Herbology
  • Історія Магії /ist’oria m’agii/ - History of Magic
  • Захист Від Темних Мистецтв /z’akhyst vid t’emnykh myst’etstv/ - Defence Against the Dark Arts
  • Асторономія-/astron’omiia/ Astronomy
  • Стародавні Руни /starod’avni r’oony/- Ancient Runes
  • Догляд За Магічними Створіннями /d’ohliad za mag’ichnymy stvor’inniamy/ - Care of Magical Creatures
  • Маґлологія-/mugglol’ogia/ -  Muggle Studies
  • Віщування-/vishchoov’annia/ - Divination
  • Числомагія-/chyslom’agia/ - Arithmancy

Магічні Створіння /Mag’ichni Stvor’innia/- Magical creatures

  • гіпогриф - hippogriff
  • дракон /drakon/ - dragon
  • русалка /rus’alka/ - mermaid
  • велитенський кальмар /velyt’enskyi kalmar/- giant squid
  • кентавр /kent’avr/ - centaur
  • ельф домовик-/elf domov’yk/ - house elf
  • павук акромантула /pav’ook akromantula/ - acromantula spider
  • єдиноріг /yedynor’ih/- unicorn
  • фенікс - phoenix
  • докся /doksia/ - doxy
  • вовкулака /vovkul’aka/, перевертень /per’evereten/ - werewolf
  • велитень -/v’elynen/ giant
  • вампір /vampir/- vampire
  • дементор - dementor
  • троль - troll
  • ґоблін - goblin
  • тестрал - thestral
  • ніфлер - niffler
  • флоберв’як /flobberv’ iak/ - flobberworm

Магічні Речі - Magical objects

  • Карта Мародреів /k’arta marod’eriv/ - Marauder’s Map
  • Старша Паличка  /st’arsha p’alychka/ - Elder Wand
  • Воскрешальний Камніь /voskresh’alny k’amin/ - Resurrection Stone
  • Плащ-невидимка /plashc nevyd’ymka/ - Cloak of Invisibility
  • Нагадайка /nahad’aika/ - Remembrall
  • Світлогасник /svitloh’asnyk/ - Deluminator
  • Філософський Камінь /filos’ofskyi k’amin/ -  Philosopher’s Stone
  • Вибухові Карти /vybookh’ovi k’arty/ - Exploding Snap
  • Чаша Хельги Хафелпаф /ch’asha h’elgy hufflepuff/ - Helga Hufflepuff’s Cup
  • Діадема Ровени Рейвенкло /diad’ema row’eny rewenclaw/ - Ravenclaw’s Diadem
  • Меч Ґодрика Ґрифіндора /mech g’odryka gryfind’ora/- Sword of Gryffindor
  • Медальйон Салазара Слизерина /medali’on s’alazara sl’yzeryna/ - Slytherin’s Locket
  • Келих Вогню /k’elykh vohni’u/- Goblet of Fire
  • Сортувальний Капелюх /sortoov’alnyi kapeli’ukh/ - Sorting Hat
  • Дзеркало Яцрес /dz’erkalo iatsres/ (lit. mirror of heart) - Mirror of Erised
  • Сито Спогадів /s’yto sp’ohadiv/ - Pensieve

Квідич - Quidditch

  • воротар /vorot’ar/ - keeper
  • загонич, загоничка /zah’onych, zah’onychka/ - chaser 
  • відбивач, відбивачка /vidbyv’ach, vidbyv’achka/ - beater
  • ловець, ловчиня /lov’ets, lovch’ynia/ - seaker
  • квафел /kv’afel/ - quaffle
  • бладжер - bludger
  • золотий снич /zolot’yi snych/ - golden snitch

Персонажі - some characters’ names 

A lot of names are changed just slightly but are still easily regonisable, so there’s no point in listing them here.

  • Горацій Слизоріг /hor’atsiy sl’yzorih/ - Horacio Slughorn
  • Аластор “Дикозор” Муді /dykoz’or/ - Alastor ‘Mad Eye’ Moody 
  • Червохвіст /chervokhv’ist/ - Wormtail
  • Гультяй /hoolti’ay/ - Padfoot
  • Золоторіг /zolotor’ih/ - Prongs
  • Темний Лорд/Володар /t’emnyi lord, vol’odar/ - Dark Lord
  • Відомо-Хто /vid’omo khto/ - You-Know-Who
  • Той, Кого Не Можна Називати /toi koh’o ne m’ozhna nasyv’aty/ - He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named
  • Криволапик /kryvol’apyk/ - Crookshanks

Привиди - Ghosts

  • Майже Безголовий Нік /m’aizhe bezol’ovyi nik/ - Nearly Headless Nick
  • Кривавий Барон /kryv’avyi/ - Bloody Baron
  • Гладка Пані /hladk’a p’ani/ - Fat Lady
  • Плаксива Мірта /plaks’yva m’irta/ - Moaning Myrtle

Let me know if you see any mistakes!

Inspired by @ mylittlelanguagelab and their Polish list!

The ‘ before vowels stands for accent. 

Nouns

  • магія /m’agia/ - magic
  • чарівник /charivn’yk/ - wizard
  • чарівниця /charivn’ytsia/, відьма /v’idma/ - witch
  • чарівна паличка /char’ivna p’alychka/ - wand
  • закляття /zakli’attia/ - spell
  • казан /kaz’an/ - cauldron
  • настійка /nast’iyka/ - potion
  • замок /zamok/ - castle
  • підземелля /pidzem’ellia/ - dungeon
  • таємний прохід /tai’emnyi prokh’id/ - secret passageway
  • вежа /v’ezha/ - tower
  • коридор /koryd’or/ - hallway
  • класна кімната /kl’asna kimn’ata/, клас /klas/ - classroom
  • урок /oor’ok/ - lesson
  • підручник /pdir’oochnyk/ - textbook
  • пергамент /perh’ament/ - parchment
  • бібліотека /bibliokt’eka/ - library
  • перо /per’o/ - quill
  • маґл (m), маґелка (f) /mugelka/ - muggle 


Предмети /Predm’ety/ - Subjects

  • Замовляння /zamovli’annia/ - Charms
  • Настійки /nast’iyky/ - Potions
  • Трансфігурація /transfigur’atsia/-  Transfiguration
  • Гербалогія /herbal’ogia/ - Herbology
  • Історія Магії /ist’oria m’agii/ - History of Magic
  • Захист Від Темних Мистецтв /z’akhyst vid t’emnykh myst’etstv/ - Defence Against the Dark Arts
  • Асторономія-/astron’omiia/ Astronomy
  • Стародавні Руни /starod’avni r’oony/- Ancient Runes
  • Догляд За Магічними Створіннями /d’ohliad za mag’ichnymy stvor’inniamy/ - Care of Magical Creatures
  • Маґлологія-/mugglol’ogia/ -  Muggle Studies
  • Віщування-/vishchoov’annia/ - Divination
  • Числомагія-/chyslom’agia/ - Arithmancy

Магічні Створіння /Mag’ichni Stvor’innia/- Magical creatures

  • гіпогриф - hippogriff
  • дракон /drakon/ - dragon
  • русалка /rus’alka/ - mermaid
  • велитенський кальмар /velyt’enskyi kalmar/- giant squid
  • кентавр /kent’avr/ - centaur
  • ельф домовик-/elf domov’yk/ - house elf
  • павук акромантула /pav’ook akromantula/ - acromantula spider
  • єдиноріг /yedynor’ih/- unicorn
  • фенікс - phoenix
  • докся /doksia/ - doxy
  • вовкулака /vovkul’aka/, перевертень /per’evereten/ - werewolf
  • велитень -/v’elynen/ giant
  • вампір /vampir/- vampire
  • дементор - dementor
  • троль - troll
  • ґоблін - goblin
  • тестрал - thestral
  • ніфлер - niffler
  • флоберв’як /flobberv’ iak/ - flobberworm

Магічні Речі - Magical objects

  • Карта Мародреів /k’arta marod’eriv/ - Marauder’s Map
  • Старша Паличка  /st’arsha p’alychka/ - Elder Wand
  • Воскрешальний Камніь /voskresh’alny k’amin/ - Resurrection Stone
  • Плащ-невидимка /plashc nevyd’ymka/ - Cloak of Invisibility
  • Нагадайка /nahad’aika/ - Remembrall
  • Світлогасник /svitloh’asnyk/ - Deluminator
  • Філософський Камінь /filos’ofskyi k’amin/ -  Philosopher’s Stone
  • Вибухові Карти /vybookh’ovi k’arty/ - Exploding Snap
  • Чаша Хельги Хафелпаф /ch’asha h’elgy hufflepuff/ - Helga Hufflepuff’s Cup
  • Діадема Ровени Рейвенкло /diad’ema row’eny rewenclaw/ - Ravenclaw’s Diadem
  • Меч Ґодрика Ґрифіндора /mech g’odryka gryfind’ora/- Sword of Gryffindor
  • Медальйон Салазара Слизерина /medali’on s’alazara sl’yzeryna/ - Slytherin’s Locket
  • Келих Вогню /k’elykh vohni’u/- Goblet of Fire
  • Сортувальний Капелюх /sortoov’alnyi kapeli’ukh/ - Sorting Hat
  • Дзеркало Яцрес /dz’erkalo iatsres/ (lit. mirror of heart) - Mirror of Erised
  • Сито Спогадів /s’yto sp’ohadiv/ - Pensieve

Квідич - Quidditch

  • воротар /vorot’ar/ - keeper
  • загонич, загоничка /zah’onych, zah’onychka/ - chaser 
  • відбивач, відбивачка /vidbyv’ach, vidbyv’achka/ - beater
  • ловець, ловчиня /lov’ets, lovch’ynia/ - seaker
  • квафел /kv’afel/ - quaffle
  • бладжер - bludger
  • золотий снич /zolot’yi snych/ - golden snitch

Персонажі - some characters’ names 

A lot of names are changed just slightly but are still easily regonisable, so there’s no point in listing them here.

  • Горацій Слизоріг /hor’atsiy sl’yzorih/ - Horacio Slughorn
  • Аластор “Дикозор” Муді /dykoz’or/ - Alastor ‘Mad Eye’ Moody 
  • Червохвіст /chervokhv’ist/ - Wormtail
  • Гультяй /hoolti’ay/ - Padfoot
  • Золоторіг /zolotor’ih/ - Prongs
  • Темний Лорд/Володар /t’emnyi lord, vol’odar/ - Dark Lord
  • Відомо-Хто /vid’omo khto/ - You-Know-Who
  • Той, Кого Не Можна Називати /toi koh’o ne m’ozhna nasyv’aty/ - He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named
  • Криволапик /kryvol’apyk/ - Crookshanks

Привиди - Ghosts

  • Майже Безголовий Нік /m’aizhe bezol’ovyi nik/ - Nearly Headless Nick
  • Кривавий Барон /kryv’avyi/ - Bloody Baron
  • Гладка Пані /hladk’a p’ani/ - Fat Lady
  • Плаксива Мірта /plaks’yva m’irta/ - Moaning Myrtle

Let me know if you see any mistakes!

blog.name: fandom-addicts-yeah
blog.title: fandoms ruined our life
blog.description:
Our Masterlist.
The Fandoms we write for!
We're a multifandom writing blog!Just send in scenario, headcanons, ships, or even small drabble requests and we will do our best at satisfying your needs. SHIPS:CLOSED. SCENARIOS, HEADCANON, DRABBLES:OPEN

summary:
Fandoms We Write For!
Voltron
Danganronpa
BNHA (My Hero Academia)
Percy Jackson (we also do cabin placements)
Harry Potter (and...
body:
Fandoms We Write For!

  • Voltron
  • Danganronpa
  • BNHA (My Hero Academia)
  • Percy Jackson (we also do cabin placements)
  • Harry Potter (and the Marauders)
  • Stranger Things
  • Supernatural
  • Homestuck (and Hiveswap)
  • Dear Evan Hansen
  • Heathers
  • Be More Chill

What we do for them:

  • fanfiction (based on your requests)
  • headcanons (based on your requests)
  • preferences (you give us a situation and a few characters and we write short paragraphs)
  • dating (character) would include
  • ships (on follower milestones and holidays)
  • nsfw, but we might not accept to do everything, as we all are inexperienced in this domain.

If you want to be tagged in anything, just ask us!!

~Sarah

blog.name: naomiknight-17
blog.title: My 3AM Brain... RETURNS
blog.description: Naomi, 30ish, she/her, cis, panromantic gray ace. Formerly NaomiKnight17. Feminism, cartoons, body positivity, LGBT+ acceptance and a lot of meme-loving fuckery abound here.

tags: also my tummy is still upset
ate too many fried things yesterday
summary:
I was awakened by indigestion at like 5 AM and got up to use the washroom and take some tums
And as I'm sitting in bed trying to...
body:
I was awakened by indigestion at like 5 AM and got up to use the washroom and take some tums

And as I’m sitting in bed trying to chill and wait for the tums to work, hubby Jon muttered something incomprehensible.

So I was like, “What??”

And he goes, “I was saying… wait… uh”

“You’re talking in your sleep, aren’t you.”

“No.”

“Yes you are.”

“No. I was just wondering if it was the Azkaban alarms…”

“The what?? What about fucking Azkaban?”

“I was wondering if the Azkaban alarms were what woke you up so early.”

After that he kinda came to enough to explain that he was dreaming some kind of Harry Potter modern day AU involving the Marauders.

This man has a rich dream and fantasy life, let me tell you

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: I was too cheap to buy my own program so took a picture of this lad taking a picture of his program. The Cursed Child was one of...
caption:
I was too cheap to buy my own program so took a picture of this lad taking a picture of his program. The Cursed Child was one of the most wonderful experiences of my life, go see it.

Yesterday was an absolutely great day all round, Irish referendum passed, I saw this in London with a pal, had a few bevvies and an incredible steak, and Liverpool lost the final. Excellent stuff.

blog.name: welcometotheravenclawcommonroom
blog.title: The Ravenclaw Common Room
blog.description: A place for everyone who considers themselves a Ravenclaw.

summary: Okay, but give me a Hermione Granger who cannot cook for the life of her. She’s done research, she’s taken classes, she’s tried...
body:
Okay, but give me a Hermione Granger who cannot cook for the life of her. She’s done research, she’s taken classes, she’s tried everything and goddamit why can’t she make this work?!

Give me a Ron Weasley who watched his mother cook for years and somehow inherited her uncanny ability to just throw things in a pot and make it taste amazing. Give me a Ron Weasley who tries to teach his wife to cook because she asks him to and rubs her shoulders and fixes the light fixtures when she fails again. Give me a Ron Weasley who wears a “Kiss the cook” apron and makes all the meals for the family. Give me a Ron Weasley who fondly tells Hermione “for Merlin’s sake, you’re the bloody minister of magic, babe, you don’t have to be good at everything.” Give me a Ron Weasley who adores his wife and loves working part-time at the shop with Fred and George (there was a rumour going around that Fred died- this is poppycock. Please ignore it) and decides he loves being a househusband and defying gender roles but in a quieter way than his hurricane of a wife, who’s amazing and in-your-face and gods, he loves her. Give me a Ron who decides that he’s not so fond of the fame and glory that he gained in the war as he thought he would be, and who finally understands why Harry hated it so much in school. Give me a Ronald Weasley who learns to do laundry and mend clothes and keep house and makes lunch for his kids before they go off to muggle primary school and his wife before she goes to work and decides that being his family’s number one favourite person is more than enough. Give me a Ron who has a secret fondness for daytime soap operas when everyone’s out of the house and he’s not at the shop. Give me a Ron who is happy and healthy and realises that he’s so much more than just the sixth child or the leftover, that he’s loved, that he’s enough.

blog.name: acciofandomlove
blog.title: Lily Potter
blog.description: Hey guys!!! I am a true bookworm. Novels are my life. Get ready for stupid stuff!

title: Siriusly Overboard
body:
Me: I am obsessed with hp puns and jokes.
Friend: I am sure its not that bad.
Me: I'm sure you're very ron.
Friend: Haha. Very funny!
Me: No, I'm sirius.
Friend: Lol! I get your point now.
Me: That's not all-ivander.
Friend: Ok stop! Its getting irritating now.
Me: I can make granger jokes.
Friend: STOP!
Me: Ok, why so Sirius. You must be a dementor because you are sucking all the happiness from me. ;)
Friend: Get out!

dialogue.phrase: Ok, why so Sirius. You must be a dementor because you are sucking all the happiness from me. ;)

blog.name: incorrecthogwartsmysteryquotes
blog.title: Incorrect quotes from "Hogwarts Mystery"
blog.description: The quotes are based on the characters from the game "Harry Potter: hogwarts mystery", because we can never have enough Harry Potter characters. Feel free to message me, submit something or send an ask about anything, except for pineapples. Tags are weird ok.
